United Arab Emirates University: United Arab Emirates University (UAEU) (Arabic: جامعة الإمارات العربية المتحدة) is a public research university located in Al Ain, United Arab Emirates. Founded in 1976 by the country's first President, Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan,[1] it is the oldest university in the United Arab Emirates and offers courses in various subjects up to post-graduation.
